subject_info.name: Classical_Art
subject_info.description: Questions about classical art, architecture, and visual culture

questions.question: Choose the letter that best describes a kouros statue of the 6th century BC.

options.A: Fully clothed, stylized hair, protruding eyes and a contrapposto pose
options.B: Left foot slightly advanced, nude, hands clenched at the side, archaic smile
options.C: Partially clothed, geometric musculature, arms posed in action, left foot advanced
options.D: Smooth and rounded features, nude, calm expression, tilted hips

questions.question: What order of architecture had a column that sat directly on the stylobate, with tryglyphs and metopes in the entablature above the column?
What is the subject of the metopes on the Temple of Zeus at Olympia?

options.A: Chariot race of Pelops and Oenomaus
options.C: The battle of Lapiths and Centaurs

options.A: the pediment of the Siphnian Treasury
options.C: the Altar of Zeus at Pergamum

options.B: part of the Doric frieze made up of decorative slabs usually carved in high relief
options.C: the slab of stone at the top of a column supporting the entablature
options.D: the top step of a building leading to the front entrance
